thread.section_title: Hilton London Tower Bridge - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good quality
thread.title_full: Good quality - Review of Hilton London Tower Bridge, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: evem238
title: Good quality
text: Breakfast was excellent and reasonably priced for London. The staff were very friendly and pleasant on check in and offered me a variety of services. The room was nice and clean and functional. The hotel was right beside the offices I needed to visit. The bar was very pleasant place to spend the evening and they had a good cocktail list.
